title: List of all Android dialog  libraries for use in your project
meta: See collection of all Android dialog  libraries, filter by license, modified date, languages, and select best for your usecase.

repoList.name: TimePickerDialog
repoList.description: An Android time picker library.

repoList.name: LicensesDialog
repoList.description: LicensesDialog is an open source library to display licenses of third-party libraries in an Android app.

repoList.name: Android-RateThisApp
repoList.description: Android library to show "Rate this app" dialog

repoList.name: L-Dialogs
repoList.description: A small library replicating the new dialogs in android L.

repoList.name: MaterialDialog-Android
repoList.description: 📱Android Library to implement animated, 😍beautiful, 🎨stylish Material Dialog in android apps easily.

repoList.name: Android-Five-Stars-Library
repoList.description: Android Five Stars Library is a small library that helps developer add a "Rate My App" dialog to their applications. It's called "Five Stars" because the dialog has a different behaviour based on the rating given by the user.

repoList.name: LovelyDialog
repoList.description: This library is a set of simple wrapper classes that are aimed to help you easily create fancy material dialogs.

repoList.name: BottomDialogs
repoList.description: An Android library that shows a customizable Material-based bottom sheet. API 11+ required.

repoList.name: DialogSheet
repoList.description: An Android library to create fully material designed bottom dialogs similar to the Android Pay app.

repoList.name: android-material-app-rating
repoList.description: This library allows to use customized Rating Dialog inside applications.

repoList.name: TimePickerDialog
repoList.description: An Android time picker library.

repoList.name: LicensesDialog
repoList.description: LicensesDialog is an open source library to display licenses of third-party libraries in an Android app.
